speaker.name: Ramakrishna Ramaswamy
speaker.biodata: Ramakrishna Ramaswamy, School of Physical Sciences, JNU, New Delhi, is President of Indian Academy of Sciences (2016–18). Ramaswamy’s research interests are in the intersection of nonlinear science, statistical physics, and computational biology. He is also a Fellow of the Indian National Science Academy and of TheWorld Academy of Sciences, (TWAS).
